get.description: Returns all accounts. Accounts are required for cash based invoicing and business document lines and can be optionally added to items. Every account has one or multiple tax class entries, which define the tax rate for the line.

parameters.description: Limit of results.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Offset to start with result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Comma separated list of sort params. The direction could append to the sort property by a colon.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Id of the account type to filter by (if available)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Effective date at which the account should be valid. Defaults to today.
parameters.name: effective_date

parameters.description: Account use determines which accounts are used for which purpose, depending on API.
parameters.name: use

parameters.description: Account code
parameters.name: code

parameters.description: Search text filtering by code, name or description.
parameters.name: search_text

parameters.description: If set to true, only visible accounts will be returned.
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: If set to true, only available accounts will be returned. An available account is not locked by another module and can be used for booking. Cash register accounts are usually reserved.
parameters.name: available

parameters.description: If set to false, only accounts with no backing payment account will be returned. Default: true.
parameters.name: payment_accounts

parameters.description: If set to true, only used accounts will be returned. If set to false, only unused accounts will be returned. A used account is an account or contra account used in a journal (invoice, ...).
parameters.name: used

get.description: Returns the current fiscal year if client uses CMA (Cash Method Accounting). This is a shorter, but equivalent way to get the current fiscal year within the base setup.
Returns the current fiscal year if client uses DEA (Double Entry Accounting). This is a shorter, but equivalent way to get the current fiscal year within the base setup.
Returns the current fiscal year if client uses RLA (Rental and Leasing Accounting). This is a shorter, but equivalent way to get the current fiscal year within the base setup.

post.description: Uploads a file to the staging folder with a multipart request. The metadata body defines optional attributes to add to the document. The multipart attachment must be one file of a supported type (PDF, XML, images). See the examples for a multipart request. The current maximum size for one file is 2MB.

currency.description: Currency code for the header in ISO format. Equals the currency of the bank account.

file_name.description: File name for the bank statement header. Will be sanitized.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bank statement.

payment_account.description: The payment account this statement belongs to. See /cbs/payment_accounts.

state.description: Current processing status of the header.

statement_date.description: Date of creation or export for this bank statement.

value_date_from.description: Earliest date of all statement lines in the header.

value_date_to.description: Last date of all statement lines in the header.

additional_text.description: Additional text supplied for the transaction.

amount.description: Total amount of the booking. Positive for credit, and negative for debit transactions.

booking_date.description: Actual booking date of the transaction, as determined by the bank.

currency_code.description: Currency code for the line in ISO format. Defaults to the main currency.

customer_data.description: Additional customer data about the transaction.

description.description: Description field describing the purpose of the line.

line_number.description: Line number of the line, must be unique. Will be auto-numbered on import.

note.description: Additional note supplied for the transaction.

originator.description: Name of the person or company that originated the transaction.

originator_account_number.description: Account number of the person or company that originated the transaction.

originator_bank_code.description: Bank code of the person or company that originated the transaction.

originator_bank_reference.description: Bank reference of the person or company that originated the transaction.

partner_account_number.description: Account number of the person or company that received the transaction.

partner_bank_code.description: Bank code of the person or company that received the transaction.

partner_name.description: Name of the person or company that received the transaction.

reason_for_transfer.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reason_for_transfer_1.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reason_for_transfer_2.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reason_for_transfer_3.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reason_for_transfer_4.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reason_for_transfer_5.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

state.description: Current import state, used to determine if a line is a potential duplicate of an earlier line. Potential duplicates can be submitted by PSD2 providers, but are marked as such.

transaction_id.description: Optional, unique transaction id. Lines with duplicate transaction ids are filtered out as duplicates.

value_date.description: Value date of the transaction, as submitted by the initiator.

date.description: Date of cancellation, defaulted with today.

layout_setup.description: Layout setup id of the layout to use for the cancellation document PDF, see /layout_setups resource. Is defaulted with the configured default setup. Ignored for EXTERNAL type business documents.

e_invoice_version.description: If e-invoice creation is configured, this property is mandatory and defines the e-invoice version.

layout_setup.description: Layout setup id of the layout to use for the cancellation document PDF, see /layout_setups resource. Is defaulted with the configured default setup. Ignored for EXTERNAL type business documents.

payment_term.description: Payment term id, see /payment_terms resource. Determines due date, dunning date, etc. and is defaulted with the configured default payment term, if any.

sequence_group.description: Sequence group id, for when a different sequence group is to be used besides the configured default group. See the /sequence_groups resource.

allow_past_income.description: Receipts are usually created with the current date and time. If this is enabled, backdating receipts is allowed, and a date/time can be supplied on receipt creation. This is useful when receipts are created by hand for mobile workers and registered afterwards. Dating a receipt before the last receipt in the cash register is prohibited regardless of this setting.

current_balance.description: Current total balance of the register. Cannot drop below zero.

default.description: Indicates if this is the default cash register to use in frontends.

enable_drawback.description: When this is enabled, all front-ends of the cash register are supposed to activate the cashback feature, i.e. display the amount of currency returned to the customer on overpayment.

group.description: Optional, freely defined register group, for example by payment method or branch office.

id.description: Unique id of the cash register.

last_receipt_date_time.description: Date and time of the last receipt. No receipts can be created with a date and time before this date.

name.description: Human-readable name of the cash register.

number.description: Cash register number, which must be unique.

security_type.description: Security type of the cash register.

state.description: NEW indicates a new cash register that can be freely edited and is not active. ACTIVE are cash registers ready to accept receipts and are read-only except for a few properties. LOCKED registers have been decommissioned and cannot be used. TEST designates a freely usable test cash register, which is automatically created.

allow_past_income.description: Receipts are usually created with the current date and time. If this is enabled, backdating receipts is allowed, and a date/time can be supplied on receipt creation. This is useful when receipts are created by hand for mobile workers and registered afterwards. Dating a receipt before the last receipt in the cash register is prohibited regardless of this setting.

current_balance.description: Current total balance of the register. Cannot drop below zero.

default.description: Indicates if this is the default cash register to use in frontends.

enable_drawback.description: When this is enabled, all front-ends of the cash register are supposed to activate the cashback feature, i.e. display the amount of currency returned to the customer on overpayment.

group.description: Optional, freely defined register group, for example by payment method or branch office.

id.description: Unique id of the cash register.

last_receipt_date_time.description: Date and time of the last receipt. No receipts can be created with a date and time before this date.

name.description: Human-readable name of the cash register.

number.description: Cash register number, which must be unique.

security_type.description: Security type of the cash register.

state.description: NEW indicates a new cash register that can be freely edited and is not active. ACTIVE are cash registers ready to accept receipts and are read-only except for a few properties. LOCKED registers have been decommissioned and cannot be used. TEST designates a freely usable test cash register, which is automatically created.

description.description: Human-readable name of the layout.

font_color.description: Color of the font in HTML hex.

font_type.description: Font family, like ARIAL or COURIER.

footer.description: Footer text printed at the bottom of the page.

header.description: Header text printed at the top of the page.

language.description: Standard language for the cash register. See fnd/languages

layout_print_type.description: Defines the type of the layout, being either types for printers (like A4) or special receipt printer types.

line_amount.description: For receipts printed on a printer with limited space (Star printer), this property determines if either the net or total price of a line should be printed on the receipt.

logo_present.description: Indicates if logo is present for cash register.

position_footer.description: Relative position of the footer text.

position_header.description: Relative position of the header text.

position_logo.description: Relative position of the logo (top image).

print_discount.description: Defines if detailed discount information should be printed on the receipt.

subject.description: Subject line for the regular receipt.

subject_cancellation.description: Subject line for the cancellation receipt.

table_color.description: Color of the background in HTML hex.

text_after_lines.description: Text printed after the receipt lines.

text_before_lines.description: Text printed after the subject and before the receipt lines.

color.description: Color used for this payment account in UI.

custom_name.description: Custom name chosen for this payment account.

iban.description: IBAN of the account. Only present for bank accounts.

assignment_count.description: Count of the files assigned to the invoice.

booked.description: States if the invoice is booked.

cancelled_date.description: Cancellation date. If a date is present, the invoice is treated as cancelled.

cancelled_reason.description: For cancelled invoices, the reason supplied during the cancellation.

customer.description: Customer reference of customer for invoice.

customer_name.description: Name of the customer, if no ID is provided.

delivery_from_date.description: Optional from date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

delivery_to_date.description: Optional to date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

description.description: Optional description for the invoice.

due_date.description: Optional due date of the invoice.

ec_period.description: Ec period required for Ig or reverse charge invoices.

id.description: ID of the invoice, automatically assigned.

invoice_date.description: Invoice date. Required for double entry accounting and for special bookings.

invoice_reference.description: Optional reference to other receipts, invoices, etc.

invoice_sequence.description: Automatically assigned sequence number for booked invoices. Unpaid invoices in single-entry accounting don't have a sequence number.

invoice_type.description: States if the invoice is an incoming invoice or an outgoing invoice.

net.description: Net amount of the invoice. Will be calculated automatically.

note.description: Optional internal note for the invoice.

open.description: Unpaid remaining amount in the invoice currency.

open_in_main_currency.description: Unpaid remaining amount in the accounting currency. When fully paid, the remaining amount is 0.

paid_date.description: Date the invoice was paid. When supplied at invoice creation, the invoice is marked as paid immediately and a booking created (for single-entry accounting). Mandatory field for When supplied paid contra account must be applied.

payment_reference.description: Optional payment reference. Only possible if Pis module is available.

show_in_payment_candidates.description: Indicates if the invoice is seen in payment candidates. Only possible if Pis module is available. Defaults to true.

supplier_name.description: Name of the supplier, if no ID is provided.

tax.description: Tax amount of the invoice. Will be calculated automatically.

total.description: Total amount of the invoice, including tax.

avatar_present.description: Indicates if the client has an avatar set, which can be fetched through its resource.

buying_client.description: ID of the client that is billed for this client. This can be the client itself, the parent client, or the accountant.

country.description: Accounting country, which determines country-specific functionality and variations.

display_name.description: Combined and readable name of the client. Consists of the first name, surname and/or company name

encryption_active.description: Indicates if the client has encryption of customer data enabled.

parent_client.description: ID of the main client, if this client is a subclient.

portal.description: The registration portal/domain of the client. Per default a client can only be used from this domain.

product_subtype.description: A special subtype from the product type, which is determined by the chosen accounting income type and affects localizations.

product_type.description: Product type of the client. This determines the accounting type (single-entry or double-entry accounting) or a special client type like PSD2 only.

registration_product_number.description: Currently active product, or chosen product at registration.

support_access_granted.description: Indicates if the support team is allowed to access the client.

code.description: Short code as identifier for countries.

euOss_country_code.description: The country code within the European Union, if any. This cGBan be different to the regular code.

key_name.description: The key keyName used in the localization resource.

localized_name.description: The full keyName of the country translated to the user locale.

uid_number_available.description: Whether or not this country has a uid number.

my_supplier_number.description: Number or identifier the customer assigned to your client.

IncomingInvoiceLineCreationDtoV2.description: List of invoice lines. The supplied order of the array defines the assigned line numbers.

account.description: Account id to use for this line. See the /accounts resource, and the E account type.

amount.description: The amount of the line. Either net or total, defined in amount type.

amount_type.description: Determines if the item price is net without tax (N) or total (T). For IG/reverse charge lines, the amount type must be N.

description.description: Description text of the line.

net.description: Total net amount of the line. Must match calculated amount from amount, amount type and tax class entry.

private_part.description: Private part amount as total amount or percentage. Must be set with privatePartType and private part account. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

private_part_account.description: Account id to use for the private part. Defaulted if not specified. See the /accounts resource - the account must be a private part account.

private_part_type.description: Determines the type of the private part.

tags.description: Any tags to associate this item with

tax.description: Total tax amount of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.Must match calculated amount from amount, amount type and tax class entry.

total.description: Total amount (net + tax) of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.Must match calculated amount from amount, amount type and tax class entry.

account.description: Account to use for this line. See the /cbs/accounts resource, and the appropriate account use.

additional_sequence.description: Additional  purchase journal number sequence assigned to the line on creation.

allowed_changes.description: Changes are only allowed for the given fields in this list. All other fields cannot be changed.

amount.description: The total item amount, i.e. number of units purchased. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

amount_type.description: Determines if amount is net without tax (NET) or total with tax (GROSS). For IG/reverse charge lines, the amount type has to be NET.

asset_ledger.description: Related asset ledger of invoice line

description.description: Description text of the line.

ig_state.description: IG state of the invoice line. Only relevant for services and goods purchased cross-country in the European Union.

net.description: Total net amount of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

private_part.description: Private part amount as total amount or percentage. Must be set with privatePartType. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

private_part_account.description: Account code to use for the private part. Defaulted if not specified. See the /accounts resource - the account must be a private part account.

private_part_type.description: Determines if the private part is a fixed amount (A) or a percentage (P)

tags.description: Tags of the invoice line.

tax.description: Total tax amount of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

taxes.description: Tax class entries and modifier for the line.

total.description: Total amount (net + tax) of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

account.description: The account associated with the payment.

description.description: A description or purpose of the payment.

rest_type.description: Defines how to handle any remaining unpaid amount. Leave unset to leave the amount open.

cancelled.description: Indicates if the booking was cancelled. If set, a InvoiceCancellationBookingDto exists with the same number.

cancelled_booking.description: Code of the booking that was cancelled

cancelled_reason.description: Reason the booking was cancelled for

journals.description: The journals generated with this booking.

number.description: Sequence number of the booking, starting with 1. Note that InvoiceCancellationBookingDto bookings share the number with the booking they cancel.

payment_amount_in_main_currency.description: Amount that was paid in the main currency

reconciled.description: Indicates if this booking was reconciled with an entity from another application module. If set, the booking cannot be cancelled directly and must be cancelled from the module.

reconciliation_type.description: The type of reconciliation, if it was reconciled. Currently only BANK_STATEMENT is a possible type.

type.description: Type of the booking: InvoiceInitialBooking for bookings that were generated in cash-based accounting or with the invoice, InvoicePaymentBooking for payments created in double-entry accounting, and InvoiceCancellationBooking for bookings that cancel another booking.

cash_register.description: Cash register id that is to process the payment, see the /cash_registers resource. The test register (id 0) cannot be used. Either cashRegister and payingAccount must be supplied.

description.description: A description or purpose of the payment.

rest_type.description: Defines how to handle any remaining unpaid amount. Leave unset to leave the amount open.

additional_address.description: Additional address id, see the /customer/{customer}/additional_addresses resource. Sets an address besides the default to be used for this document.

currency.description: Currency code of the document, see the /currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

currency_rate.description: Currency rate of the document. Defaulted with 1.

customer.description: ID of the customer, see the /customers resource.

customer_name.description: Customer name, for when the customer doesn't have a record, or doesn't need one. Ignored if a customer id is set.

date.description: Date of the invoice. Always required.

delivery_from_date.description: Optional from date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

delivery_to_date.description: Optional to date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

due_date.description: The date by which the invoice is due.

dunning_stop.description: Indicates if the invoice is not to be dunned. If set, the reason must be set as well.

dunning_stop_reason.description: Reason for the dunning stop. Mandatory if dunning stop is set.

e_invoice_version.description: If e-invoice creation is configured, this property is mandatory and defines the e-invoice version.

finalize.description: Specifies whether a document should be attached immediately.

inherit_tags.description: When set the tags of the Customer, Supplier and items are inherited onto this line.

layout_setup.description: ID of the layout to be used, seee the /layout_setups resource. Defaulted with configured default setup, if any, and ignored if the document state is not FINALIZED.

lines.description: List of all business document lines. The order of this array defines the numbers assigned to the lines.

net.description: Total net amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line net amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

open.description: Remaining, unpaid amount of the document (invoice or credit memo). Decreases with payments, 0 for paid documents.

open_amount_in_main_currency.description: Remaining, unpaid amount in main currency of the document (invoice or credit memo). Decreases with payments, 0 for paid documents.

payment_term.description: Payment term id, see /payment_terms resource. Determines due date, dunning date, etc. and is defaulted with the configured default payment term, if any.

reference_date.description: Optional reference date to another business case, transaction, etc.

reference_text.description: Reference info to other documents, business case information, remittance numbers, etc.

sequence_group.description: Sequence group id, for when a different sequence group is to be used besides the configured default group. See the /sequence_groups resource.

tax.description: Total tax amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line tax amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

text_bottom.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the lines. Defaulted with configured layout, unless the state is EXTERNAL.

text_defaulting.description: If true, the text at the top and bottom will be defaulted with the values from the layout.

text_top.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the subject.

total.description: Total amount of the document including tax. Must match the sum of all line totals if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

additional_address.description: Additional address id, see the /customer/{customer}/additional_addresses resource. Sets an address besides the default to be used for this document.

cancellation_date.description: Cancellation date. If a date is present, the invoice is treated as cancelled.

created_at.description: The timestamp when this record was created.

currency.description: Currency code of the document, see the /fnd/currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

currency_rate.description: Currency rate of the document. Defaulted with 1.

current_xml_file.description: Reference to the current XML document.

customer_name.description: Customer name, for when the customer doesn't have a record, or doesn't need one. Defaulted with the customer display name if one is set.

date.description: Date of the invoice. Always required.

delivery_from.description: Optional from date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

delivery_to.description: Optional to date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

due_date.description: The date by which the invoice is due.

dunning_creation_date.description: The date when the dunning process for this invoice was created.

dunning_stop.description: Indicates if the invoice is not to be dunned. If set, the reason must be set as well.

dunning_stop_reason.description: Reason for the dunning stop. Mandatory if dunning stop is set.

e_invoice_version.description: The version of the e-invoice used.

ec_sales_info.description: The EC Sales information of the document.

finalized_at.description: The timestamp when this document was finalized.

id.description: Unique identifier of the business document.

ignore_in_bsl.description: Indicates if this document/record should be ignored in the BSL processing.

last_dunning_date.description: The date when the last dunning process was initiated for this invoice.

last_dunning_level.description: The last dunning level reached for this invoice.

manual_address.description: If the address for this document was overridden with custom values.

net.description: Total net amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line net amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

next_invoice_date.description: The next scheduled date for an invoice generation or related action.

number.description: Number of the business document. Will be automatically generated, unless EXTERNAL is set for the state - then it is a required property. Must be unique.

open.description: Remaining, unpaid amount of the document (invoice or credit memo). Decreases with payments, 0 for paid documents.

open_in_main_currency.description: Remaining, unpaid amount in main currency of the document (invoice or credit memo). Decreases with payments, 0 for paid documents.

paid.description: Flag indicating if the document has been paid.

paid_date.description: The date when the document was paid.

payment_term.description: Reference to the payment terms applicable to this document.

payment_term_description.description: A human-readable description of the payment terms.
payment_term_description.example: Payment due within 30 days of invoice date.

reference_date.description: Optional reference date to another business case, transaction, etc.

reference_text.description: Reference info to other documents, business case information, remittance numbers, etc.

signed.description: Flag indicating if the document has been digitally signed.

state.description: Determines the state after creation. STAGING leaves the document open for editing, FINALIZED completes it, EXTERNAL for invoices created outside of the application, which requires a number (id) and will not create a PDF or default any layout properties.

tax.description: Total tax amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line tax amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

tax_modifier.description: Tax modifier flag, if it is a inner-union invoice.

template_interval.description: The interval in units (e.g., days, weeks) for the dunning template.

template_interval_type.description: The type of interval used for the dunning template (e.g., DAYS, WEEKS).

text_bottom.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the lines. Defaulted with configured layout, unless the state is EXTERNAL.

text_top.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the subject. Defaulted with configured layout, unless the state is EXTERNAL.

total.description: Total amount of the document including tax. Must match the sum of all line totals if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

additional_address.description: Additional address id, see the /customer/{customer}/additional_addresses resource. Sets an address besides the default to be used for this document.

cancellation_date.description: Cancellation date. If a date is present, the invoice is treated as cancelled.

created_at.description: The timestamp when this record was created.

currency.description: Currency code of the document, see the /fnd/currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

currency_rate.description: Currency rate of the document. Defaulted with 1.

current_xml_file.description: Reference to the current XML document.

customer_name.description: Customer name, for when the customer doesn't have a record, or doesn't need one. Defaulted with the customer display name if one is set.

account.description: Account for the income account for this line, see the /accounts resource. Defaulted with the item account, if defaulting is not disabled. Otherwise a valid account must be supplied.

amount.description: The total item amount, i.e. number of units purchased. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

description.description: Descriptive text for the item of the line.

discount.description: Optional discount amount, either as a total amount or a percentage (defined in discount mode). Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

discount_mode.description: Determines whether discount is a total amount (CONSTANT) or a percentage (RATE). Must be set together with discount amount.

item.description: Item id, see the /items resource. When supplied with a valid item and item defaulting is enabled, then description, item net price, item number and unit of measure are defaulted, but can be overridden. Without defaulting, only the reference is saved, but no data from the item applied.

item_defaulting.description: If not explicitly disabled, item data from a supplied item reference is defaulted for the line. When set to false, no data is defaulted and all fieldsmust be supplied in the request.

item_number.description: Item number, identification, or barcode. Is defaulted from the item when an item reference is supplied.

item_price.description: Item price of a single unit. Must be present if an item reference is not supplied.

name.description: Short name identifying the item of this line.

net.description: Total net price of the line. Always required for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

price_type.description: Determines it item price is net without tax (N) or total with tax (T). Must be present if an item reference is not supplied.

tags.description: Any tags to associate this invoice with

total.description: Total price, including tax, of the line. Always required for verification, and must be the sum of net and tax price. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

type.description: Special type of the line. LINE is the default and designates regular item lines, DUNNING_FEE is added when a dunning is created for the invoice. CASH_IN_CM and ON_ACCT designate lines of pre-payments to an invoice, which are subtracted from the total and not copied. TOTAL_DISCOUNT and TOTAL_SURCHARGE applies to all lines that are not ignored in total discount.

numeric_value.description: Only one value type must be present.

default_tax_class_entry.description: Tax class entry id for the account, determining the tax rate. See the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource.

default_tax_class_entry_modifier.description: The code of the default tax class entry modifier. If no tax class entry modifier is specified in a booking/invoice/etc, this class will be used, and if forced, only this class can be used.

forced_tax_class_entry.description: Whether the default tax class entry and modifier are forced in bookings/invoices/etc or not.If this is set to true, the default tax class entry must be set and bookings/invoices/etc with different tax class entries (and modifiers) are not allowed.

tax_class.description: Tax class of the account. The tax class determines available tax class entries for use in bookings.

tax_class_entry.description: Tax class entry id, determining the tax rate.

tax_class_entry_modifier.description: ID of the tax class entry modifier ('special booking')

tax_class_entry.description: Tax class entry id for the account, determining the tax rate. See the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource. Is defaulted if an item is set. Otherwise mandatory.

tax_class_entry_modifier.description: The code of the tax class entry modifier. A modifier defines a special tax circumstance that overwrites the tax accounts of the tax class entry.

UnitOfMeasureDtoV2.description: Units of measure to be used in items, receipts, and business documents.

code.description: Short code as identifier for units of measure.

key_description.description: The description key used in the localization resource.

key_name.description: The name key used in the localization resource.

localized_description.description: The full (optional) description of the unit.

localized_name.description: The full name of the unit translated to the user locale.

bearerAuth.description: The introduction earlier in this document has detailed documentation about how to authenticate. Note that for production environments, you should query the URL of the IDP from the */api/2.0/auth/issuer* endpoint.

scopes.offline_access: Used for a long-running refresh token.
scopes.openid: Used for an online token and an ID token for logout.
Used for an online token and an ID token for logout.
